sqlMap.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yymmdd') || JC_RSP_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS "SEQ" FROM DUAL
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO JC_RSP_DATA ( ID, SESSIONID, RSPDATA, STATE, IF_NO, RSP_RESULT, CARD_PRODUCT_NAME, USERFLAG, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #ID#, #SESSIONID#, #RSPDATA#, '0', #IF_NO#, #RSP_RESULT#, #CARD_PRODUCT_NAME#, #USERFLAG#, SYSDATE )
